title: Love your new apartment home! Beautiful 1 bedroom floorplans.
posting_body: ['Scarlett Place', 'Visit our community today!', '3500 Summercourt Dr Jonesboro, GA 30236', 'show contact info', 'Unit Rates:', '$1382/month', 'Unit Type:', '1-BR 1-BA', 'Unit Size:', '722 sq ft', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'What you’ll find in our community:', '◾ Controlled Access', '◾ Fitness Center', '◾ Gated Community', '◾ Parking', '◾ Picnic Area', '◾ Pool', '◾ Business Center', '◾ Double Vanity', '◾ Garages', '◾ Garden Tubs', '◾ Maintenance on site', '◾ Multi Use Room', '◾ Online Services', '◾ Property Manager on Site', '◾ Public Transportation', '◾ Sundeck', 'Description:', 'Welcome to Scarlett Place, a residential community featuring One, Two & Three bedroom apartments in Jonesboro, GA.', 'Spacious layouts and amenities welcome you home, along with exceptional service and an ideal location within walking distance to shopping, dining and entertainment options.', 'Are you looking for an apartment for rent in Jonesboro, GA?', 'Contact our friendly, professional office staff to schedule a tour today.', 'This unit comes with:', '◾ Air Conditioning', '◾ Cable Ready', '◾ Carpeting', '◾ Ceiling Fans', '◾ Dining Room', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Disposal', '◾ Extra Storage', '◾ Kitchen', '◾ Patio/Balcony', '◾ All-Electric GE Appliances', '◾ Breakfast Bar', '◾ Cable/Satellite Available', '◾ Crown Molding', '◾ Deck', '◾ Double Vanities', '◾ Hardwood Floors', '◾ High Speed Internet Access', '◾ Track Lighting', '◾ Vaulted Ceilings', 'Call or visit our website to schedule a personal tour!', 'Office Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Property Management:', 'Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '562B8D6B88794A78']
